snippet.title: Riding a Chargy Dog into Battle!
snippet.description:
Improved movement and targetting make riding creatures more fun, especially in combat. John attempts to take on a 9 Eyes he encounters in the wild.

--------------------------------------------------------

Behold, the miracle of life… packed into cubes! Create fantastic creatures in an open-world sandbox game like no other. Explore, craft, and survive—all with the help of your very own creations.

Get CHKN now on Steam Early Access: http://bit.ly/1VcOHj8

———————————
